index.headline: Idea behind the app
index.challange: I saw this as a challenge to implement the same with a web app.
index.kevin: Kevin Chromik gave me the idea with his video for Streak - The Habit Tracker App for IOS
index.about-me: Hi, I'm Jonathan, a web developer near Cologne. I have been developing websites as a hobby and also as a profession since 2012.

habits.no-habits: No habits have been entered yet.
